name: HENTHOUSAND SPECIAL: Dragon Squad ‘Old Bob’
description: The Dragon squads face harsh odds but someone has to be the thin grey line.  Volunteers step forward from the older generations to try their hand at keeping the Colony safe.  The mortality rate is close to 100% but each old codger lost in the fight against the ever encroaching dragons buys the rest of the citizens a little more time to survive.   Stay strong Bob. You brave old sausage!
